name: Homage to Frank Stella
description:
This interactive piece was inspired by works in Frank Stella's Protractor series. The tiles from which the images are generated are based on Stella's pieces Raqqa II and Harran II. Stella's Protractor series was inspired by his travels through Iran and the Middle East and the pieces are named for circular-plan towns he visited. 

Raqqa II (1970) is in the collection at the North Carolina Museum of Art: https://ncartmuseum.org/object/raqqa-ii/

Harran II (1967) is in the collection at the Guggenheim: https://www.guggenheim.org/artwork/4003

Controls:

Mobile: Tap to generate a new image.

Desktop: Press any key to display controls in the lower-left. They are:

a - toggle auto mode (default is on, with 10 second refresh)
r - toggle color set rotation (default is on)
s - toggle surprise (random) mode (default is off)
c - rotate through color set modes (default is regular)
b - toggle between black and white backgrounds (default is white)
